## matters.Api.getMany() method

Get matters associated with matter ids provided.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMany(request: GetMattersRequest): Promise<GetMattersResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [GetMattersRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.matters.getmattersrequest.md) | the matters to retrieve. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[GetMattersResponse](./smokeball-client-sdk.matters.getmattersresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

specified matters.

## Example


```
const request: matters.GetMattersRequest = {
 ids: ['d2e8aea9-e201-4be7-bbe6-a4f64cc491ab','d2e8aea9-e201-4be7-bbe6-a4f64cc491ac']
}

const matters = await sdk.matters.getMany(request);
```
